I'm glad that I could assist you. There are quite a few adventurous things to do in and around Minden. Here are a few recommendations:

1. Hang Gliding and Paragliding - Minden is known as the "Soaring Capital of America," so if you're looking for an adrenaline rush, then hang gliding or paragliding might be the perfect activity for you. There are several companies that offer tandem flights and lessons.

2. Hiking - if you're an outdoor enthusiast, then you'll love the hiking trails around Minden. There are several trails in the Pine Nut Mountains that are perfect for hiking and offer spectacular views of the surrounding area.

3. Hot Air Ballooning - nothing beats the breathtaking views of the Sierra Nevada mountain range from the basket of a hot air balloon.

4. Kayaking and Paddleboarding - Lake Tahoe and Topaz Lake are perfect destinations for kayaking, paddleboarding, and other water sports.

5. Golfing - Minden is home to several golf courses, including the Sunridge Golf Club and the Carson Valley Golf Course, both of which offer beautiful mountain views.

These are just a few suggestions, but there are plenty of other activities to do in and around Minden, so I recommend that you research and explore the area to find what suits you best!
